enhanced_by.reason: The append method modifies a list by adding an element to the end, which can be used to prepare a list for the plus method.
The minus method modifies a list by removing an element, which can be used to prepare a list for the plus method.
The transform method applies a function to each element of a list, which can be used to verify the transformed state of the list after the plus method is applied.
The find method locates an element in a list based on a predicate, which can be used to verify the presence of an element added by the plus method.
